My projects

Phyton project

The purpose of the project: Create a system for managing bank accounts, you can open an account, make deposits and withdrawals, check balances, and close accounts conveniently and securely.

Main functions in the system Actions menu (Main Menu) The user can choose from a menu of actions that includes:

  • Opening a new account
  • Money deposit
  • Withdrawal of money
  • Checking account balance
  • Account closure
  • Displaying all bank accounts
  • Calculation of the total funds in the bank
Link to the bank management project

c# project

The purpose of the project: C# project is an asset and lease management system, focusing on managing properties, tenants, and lease agreements.

The system includes the following features:

  • Property Creation
  • Tenant Management
  • Lease Agreements
  • Payment Management
  • Property Reporting
  • Closing Lease Agreements
